name: storybook-addon-code-editor
description: A Storybook add-on for live editing stories. Supports React and TypeScript.
author: JeremyRH <holcomb227@gmail.com>

scripts.build: node scripts/rm.js dist && tsc --outDir dist && node scripts/post-build.js
scripts.start-example: npm run build && cd example && npm i ../storybook-addon-code-editor-0.0.0.tgz --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm run storybook:dev
scripts.build-example: npm run build && cd example && npm i ../storybook-addon-code-editor-0.0.0.tgz && npm run storybook:build
scripts.start-composed: npm run build && cd example-composed && npm i ../storybook-addon-code-editor-0.0.0.tgz --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm run storybook:dev
scripts.build-composed: npm run build && cd example-composed && npm i ../storybook-addon-code-editor-0.0.0.tgz && npm run storybook:build
